DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Hear What Was Said in Conversation with One Other Person in Quiet Room Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to hear what was said in a conversation with one other person in a quiet room.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Hear What Was Said in Conversation with One Other Person in Quiet Room
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to hear what was said with one other person in a quiet room.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Ability to Hear What Was Said in Conversation with One Other Person in Quiet Room
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's ability to hear what was said with one other person in a quiet room.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Ability to Hear What Was Said in Conversation with One Other Person in Quiet Room
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's ability to hear what was said with one other person in a quiet room.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's ability to hear.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to hear at all.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to hear at all.

PermissibleValues.value: Unable to hear what was said, but did not wear a hearing aid
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Unable to Hear, but did not Wear Hearing Aids

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unable to Hear, but did not Wear Hearing Aids
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to hear what was said, but was not wearing their hearing aids.

Concepts.longName: Unable to Hear, but did not Wear Hearing Aids
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to hear what was said, but was not wearing their hearing aids.

PermissibleValues.value: Unable to hear what was said even with a hearing aid
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Unable to Hear even with Hearing Aids

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unable to Hear even with Hearing Aids
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to hear what was said even with hearing aids.

Concepts.longName: Unable to Hear even with Hearing Aids
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to hear what was said even with hearing aids.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to hear what was said with a hearing aid
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to Hear with Hearing Aids

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to Hear with Hearing Aids
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to hear what was said with hearing aids.

Concepts.longName: Able to Hear with Hearing Aids
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to hear what was said with hearing aids.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to hear what was said without a hearing aid
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to Hear without Hearing Aids

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to Hear without Hearing Aids
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to hear what was said without hearing aids.

Concepts.longName: Able to Hear without Hearing Aids
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to hear what was said without hearing aids.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
